contents.text: Thank you for calling Percolate, the leading content marketing platform for the world's largest brands.
For Sales and product information, press 1.
For product demonstrations and trial access, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to our Sales team for a product demonstration.

navigationGoals: Schedule a live trial demonstration of the Percolate platform to evaluate its features quickly
I’d like to schedule a demo and trial to see how Percolate can support my veteran-led nonprofit’s content strategy.
Request a live demonstration of Percolate's REST API for automating content workflows.
I’d like to schedule a live demonstration so I can see how the platform works.
Schedule a trial demo to see how Percolate can manage my research content.

contents.text: For pricing, licensing, and contract questions, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer you to a Sales representative for pricing and licensing details.

navigationGoals: Obtain a detailed pricing quote and licensing options for my team’s upcoming subscription
I need to know enterprise pricing and licensing details for my veteran-run organization’s subscription.
Inquire about enterprise-tier pricing and licensing terms for unlimited user seats.
I need to find out the subscription options, pricing, and licensing details.
Ask about pricing and academic licensing options for student use.

contents.text: For Customer Support and account inquiries, press 2.
For technical support and troubleshooting assistance, press 1.
Please hold while we connect you to a Technical Support specialist.

navigationGoals: Resolve a technical error I’m experiencing in my Percolate account dashboard
I’m unable to upload content to my campaign—please connect me with someone who can troubleshoot this issue.
Troubleshoot a 401 Unauthorized error when calling Percolate's OAuth2 endpoints.
I’m having trouble with the software and need technical support to fix it.
Get help troubleshooting a document upload error in my trial account.

contents.text: For billing, invoices, and account management, press 2.
Please hold while we transfer your call to our Account Services team.

navigationGoals: Retrieve recent invoices and update my billing information on file
I want to review my latest invoice and update our billing information for our veteran nonprofit account.
Update billing information and retrieve the latest invoice in CSV format.
I want help reviewing my invoice and managing my account billing.
Review the invoice and billing details for my recent subscription.
